hints.content:
To find how long the $\blueE{\text{silly string}}$ and $\maroonD{\text{magic scarf}}$ are together, we need to find the total.  So, we add.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/88ce97fc5fb6719a1bc34395627d4226cd3b31cd)

$\blueE{25}\text{ inches}  + \maroonD{48}\text{ inches} =\purpleD{\square}\text{ inches}$

Let's add to find the total.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/bea76abc47d652b23d0dc7801dd455aaf4c88ff3)

$\blueE{25}\text{ inches}  + \maroonD{48}\text{ inches} =\purpleD{73}\text{ inches}$
The silly string and magic scarf combined are $\purpleD{73}\text{ in}$ long.

question.content:
A clown has a silly string that is  $25$ $\text{in}$ long and a magic scarf that is $48$ $\text{in}$ long.

**How long are the clown's silly string and magic scarf combined?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $\text{in}$
